riskAdminKeys: Saddle's admin keys are controlled by a 3/5 Gnosis Safe multisig. The signers are Mariano Conti, Kain Warwick, DegenSpartan, Klim K, and Damir Bandalo. This multisig has capabilities to pause new deposits and trades in case of technical emergencies. Users will always be able to withdraw their funds regardless of new deposits being paused. The multisig can also change the swap/withdrawal fees and the per pool/account deposit limits.

riskIntro: Providing liquidity to Saddle is highly risky. Before using the protocol, we highly recommend
riskIntro3: and understanding the risks involved with being a Liquidity Provider (LP) and/or using the AMM to trade pegged value crypto assets.
riskLossOfPeg: If one of the assets in a pool significantly depegs, it will effectively mean that pool liquidity providers will be left holding only that asset.
